summary: This is a Certificate of Authenticity from an Amazon Law Enforcement Response Specialist, dated January 31, 2020, certifying that Amazon produced authentic business records in response to a law enforcement request related to Ghislaine Maxwell (External Case No. 2018R01618). The document was forwarded by the FBI on June 24, 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the external case number (2018R01618) for which Amazon produced documents in response to a law enforcement request.

events.title: Amazon executes Certificate of Authenticity
events.description: An Amazon Law Enforcement Response Specialist signs a certificate declaring that Amazon produced authentic business records in response to a law enforcement request regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: FBI forwards Amazon certificate
events.description: The FBI forwards the Amazon Certificate of Authenticity via email, referencing the case.

locations: NY (implied as FBI field office location)
keyFacts: Amazon complied with a law enforcement request for documents related to Ghislaine Maxwell (Case No. 2018R01618).
An Amazon specialist certified under penalty of perjury that the produced documents were authentic business records.
The document shows law enforcement (FBI) was actively gathering evidence from corporate entities like Amazon in the Maxwell investigation in early 2020.
